text: "Lay Down Your Guns" is a 1990 song by Australian singer Jimmy Barnes and is the leading single from his fourth studio album Two Fires. It went to number 4 in Australia and number 12 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== CD Single (D10133)/ 7" single (K 10133) # "Lay Down Your Guns" # "Broken Hearts" ==References== Category:1990 songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: Lay Down Your Guns
